import './reserve.css' import useFetch from '../../hooks/useFetch' import React, { useState } from 'react' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faCircleXmark } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' const Reserve = ({setOpen, hotelId}) => { const [selectedRooms, setSelectedRooms] = useState([]) const {data, loading, error} = useFetch(`http://localhost:8800/api/hotels/room/${hotelId}`) const handleSelect = (e) => { const checked = e.target.checked const value = e.target.value setSelectedRooms(checked ? [...selectedRooms, value] : selectedRooms.filter(item => item !== value)) } console.log(selectedRooms) return (
setOpen(false)} /> Select your room: {data.map(item => (
{item.title}
{item.desc}
Max People : {item.maxPeople}
{item.price}
{item.roomNumbers.map(roomNumber => (
))}
) )}
) } export default Reserve
